global.continue?: Ali ste prepričani da želite nadaljevati?
global.balanceErrorMessage: Nimate dovolj IOTA za dokončanje tega prenosa.
global.transferErrorMessage: Something went wrong while sending your transfer. Please try again.
global.transferSentMessage: Your transfer has been sent to the Tangle.
global.messageSentMessage: Your message has been sent to the Tangle.
global.keyReuseError: You cannot send to an address that has already been spent from.
global.invalidResponsePollingExplanation: Vozlišče ke vrnilo neveljaven odziv med pozivanjem.
global.invalidResponseFetchingAccount: The node returned an invalid response while fetching your account information.
global.invalidResponseSendingTransfer: The node returned an invalid response while sending the transfer.
global.unrecognisedPasswordExplanation: Geslo ni bilo prepoznano. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.
global.syncInProgressExplanation: Prosimo počakajte dokler sinhronizacija ni končana.
global.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Pojdite v napredne nastavitve za ponastavitev denarnice.
global.attachToTangleUnavailableExplanation: Attach to Tangle is not available on your selected node.
global.pressBackAgain: Press back again to close the app
global.cannotSendToOwnExplanation: You cannot make a value transfer to one of your own addresses.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Generirana vrednost lahko vsebuje samo črke od A-Z in številko 9. Vaša generirana vrednost ima neveljavne znake. Prosimo poskusite ponovno.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Generirana vrednost mora biti {{maxLenght}} znakov dolga. Vaša generirana vrednost je trenutno {{currentLenght}} znakov dolga. Prosimo poskusite znova.
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUse: Ime računa je že v uporabi
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUseExplanation: Prosimo vnesite edinstveno ime računa za pridobitev generirane vrednosti.
addAdditionalSeed.noNicknameExplanation: Prosimo vnesite ime računa za pridobitev generirane vrednosti.
addAdditionalSeed.seedInUseExplanation: This seed is already linked to your wallet. Please use a different one.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Izgleda kot da je nekaj šlo narobe pri posodabljanju vašega gesla. Prosimo poskusite ponovno.
changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Vaše geslo je bilo uspešno posodobljeno.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Vaše geslo je napačno. Poskusite ponovno.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Gesli se ne ujemata. Prosimo poskusite ponovno.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least 8 characters. Please try again.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: Nemorete uporabljati prejšnjega gesla kot vaše novo geslo. Prosimo poskusite ponovno z novim geslom.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Zagotovite da bo vaše geslo zapleteno in dolgo vsaj 12 znakov.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: Generirana vrednost je bila izbrisana iz odložišča za vašo varnost.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: Generirana vrednost bo izbrisana ko pritisnete "KONČANO" ali mine 60 sekund.
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Pritisnite gumb spodaj in kopirajte generirano vrednost v svojega upravitelja gesel.
copyToClipboard.doNotStore: Ne spravljajte generirane vrednost samo v tekst.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Generirana vrednost lahko vsebuje samo velike črke od A-Z in število 9. Vaša generirana vrednost ima neveljavne znake. Prosimo poskusite znova.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Generirano vrednost mora biti {{maxLenght}} znakov dolgo. Vaša generirano vrednost je trenutno {{currentLenght}} znakov dolga. Prosimo poskusite ponovno.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Generirana vrednost mora biti {{maxLenght}} znakov dolgo in mora vsebovati velike črke od A-Z ali število 9. Ne morete uporabljati generiranih vrednosti ki so daljše od {{maxLenght}}.
enterSeed.neverShare: Z NIKOMER NIKOLI NE DELITE VAŠEGA SEEDA

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: Za prijavo morate vnesti geslo. Prosimo poskusite ponovno.

newSeedSetup.seedNotGeneratedExplanation: Kliknite gumb ustvari novo generirano seme.
newSeedSetup.individualLetters: Pritisnite posamezne znake za jih ponaključit.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: Denarnica je nastavljena in pripravljena za uporabo. Če želite boste v prihodnosti želeleli kaj spreminjati poglejte v meni za nastavitve.

paperWallet.clickToPrint: Kliknite na spodnji gumb za printanje semena v papirnati obliki.
paperWallet.neverShare: Nikoli z nikomer ne delite svojega seeda.

receive.addressCopiedExplanation: Vaš naslov je bil kopiran v odložišče.

saveYourSeed.seedClearedExplanation: Generirana vrednost je bila izbrisana iz odložišča za vašo varnost.
saveYourSeed.mustSaveYourSeed: <0><0>You must save your seed with </0><1>at least one</1><2> of the options listed below.</2></0>

seedReentry.incorrectSeedExplanation: Generirana vrednost ki ste jo vnesli ni pravila. Prosimo poskusite kasneje.
seedReentry.thisIsACheck: To je test da preverite če ste shranili vašo generirano vrednost.
seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: Če niste shranili vaše vrednosti prosimo pojdite nazaj in naredite to.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Naslov mora biti {{maxLenght}} znakov dolgo in mora biti preverjeno.
send.notEnoughFundsExplanation: Nimate dovolj IOTA za dokončanje tega prenosa.
send.keyReuseExplanation: Ta naslov je že bil uporabljen. Poskusite drug naslov.
send.invalidAmountExplanation: Please enter a valid transaction amount. It may be helpful to view the IOTA unit explanation at the bottom of this page.

setPassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Vaše geslo mora biti vsaj {{minLenght}} znakov dolgo. Vaše trenutno geslo je {{currentLenght}} znakov dolgo. Prosimo poskusite ponovno.
setPassword.passwordMismatchExplanation: Vnešeni gesli se ne ujemata. Prosimo, poskusite ponovno.
setPassword.anEncryptedCopy: Šifrirana kopija vaše generirane vrednosti bo shranjena v napravi. Uporabite geslo za dostop do vaše denarnice v prihodnosti.
setPassword.ensure: Zagotovite da bo vaše geslo zapleteno in dolgo vsaj 12 znakov.

setSeedName.canUseMultipleSeeds: Uporabite lahko več generiranih vrednosti s to denarnico. Vsaka generirana vrednost potrebuje ime računa.
setSeedName.youCanAdd: Dodate lahko več generiranih vrednosti v meniju za nastavitve.

settings.transferSendingExplanation: Prosimo počakajte dokler vaša transakcija ni poslana.
settings.generatingAddressExplanation: Prosimo počakajte da se vaš naslov ustvari.
settings.syncingCompleteExplanation: Vaš račun je bil uspešno sinhroniziran.
settings.nicknameChangedExplanation: Ime vašega računa je bilo spremenjeno.
settings.accountDeletedExplanation: Vaš račun je bil odstranjen iz denarnice.
settings.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Pojdite v napredne nastavitve za ponastavitev denarnice.
settings.poorConnectionExplanation: Failed to change currency due to a poor connection.

resetWalletRequirePassword.enterPassword: Enter your password to reset the wallet.

walletSetup.doYouAlreadyHaveASeed: Ali že imate seed, ki bi ga želeli uporabiti?
walletSetup.seedExplanation: IOTA seed je kot uporabniško ime in geslo za vaš račun, združeni v enoten niz 81 znakov.
walletSetup.explanation: <0><0>You can use it to access your funds from</0><1> any wallet</1><2>, on</2><3> any device</3><4>. But if you lose your seed, you also lose your IOTA.</4></0>
walletSetup.keepSafe: Prosimo vas, da imate seed shranjen na varnem.

welcome.thankYou: Zahvaljujemo se vam za prenos IOTA denarnice.
welcome.weWillSpend: Naslednjih nekaj minut bomo porabili za nastavitve vaše denarnice.
welcome.reminder: Mogoče vas bo zamikalo, da preskočite nekaj korakov, vendar vas pozivamo, da dokončaste proces.

writeSeedDown.yourSeedIs: Your seed is {{maxSeedLength}} characters read from left to right.
writeSeedDown.writeDownYourSeed: <0> Write down your seed and checksum and </0><1>triple check</1><2> that they are correct.</2>

history.bundleHashCopiedExplanation: The bundle hash has been copied to the clipboard.
history.addressCopiedExplanation: Naslov je bil kopiran v odložišce.

logoutConfirmationModal.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

deleteAccount.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
deleteAccount.yourSeedWillBeRemoved: Your seed and transaction history will be removed.
deleteAccount.enterPassword: Enter your password to delete this account.

manualSync.pressToSync: Press the button below to sync your account.

useExistingSeed.title: Enter a seed and account name.

viewSeed.enterPassword: Enter password to view your seed.

saveSeedConfirmation.reenter: You will now be asked to re-enter your seed.
saveSeedConfirmation.reenterWarning: If your device fails and you have not saved your seed, you will lose your IOTA.

walletResetConfirmation.warning: <0><0>All of your wallet data including your </0><1>seeds, password,</1><2> and </2><3>other account information</3><4> will be lost.</4></0>

fingerprintSetup.instructionsEnable: Touch your device's fingerprint reader to enable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.instructionsDisable: Touch your device's fingerprint reader to disable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthEnabledExplanation: You have succesfully enabled fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthDisabledExplanation: You have succesfully disabled fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthFailedExplanation: Fingerprint authentication failed. Please try again.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintUnavailableExplanation: Your device does not support fingerprint recognition or it has not been configured in the device settings.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsDisable: Press the button below to disable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsEnable: Press the button below to enable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.instructionsLogin: Touch fingerprint reader to log in.

transferConfirmation.youAreAbout: You are about to send {{contents}} to the address

twoFA.wrongCodeExplanation: The code you entered is incorrect.
twoFA.emptyCodeExplanation: Please enter a code and try again.
twoFA.keyCopiedExplanation: Your 2FA key has been copied to the clipboard.
twoFA.addKey: Add this key to your 2FA app
twoFA.twoFAEnabledExplanation: You have successfully enabled Two Factor Authentication.
twoFA.enterCode: Enter the code from your 2FA app
